entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
